Articles.Content:
I made this in anticipation of a day where there will actually be a cost of building craft,, and the day that satellites will actually have a use

This little puppy will got from the launchpad to 100km orbit, with about 480 m/s of deltaV to spare, allowing for higher orbits or a small payload.

I didn't include a .craft since re-creating it will take less time than reading this post.

Nothing special, just a concept
